caption: Knowing where you stand in someone’s life isn't about accepting less; it’s about honoring yourself by seeing things as they are, not as you wish they could be. There is power in clarity. When you understand the role you play for others, you can guard your heart, find peace, and invest in those who truly show up for you. Love doesn’t have to hurt. Let it guide you towards those who care for you, just as much as you care for them.
